about.description: Experience luxury apartment living at Gurnee Glen Apartments in the heart of Village of Gurnee right next to Six Flags Great America. This community is located near many great shopping sites and restaurants, boasts elevators in every building, Oasis area with pool, controlled access, Amazon Package HUB, an amazing clubhouse, common area lounges, fitness room and balconies. In each unit, you will find top of the line finishes such as stainless steel appliances, vinyl plank flooring, quartz counter tops and premium carpet. Contact us today to visit Gurnee Glen Apartments! Gurnee Glen Apartments is an apartment community located in Lake County and the 60031 ZIP Code. This area is served by the Gurnee School District 56 attendance zone.
